Sentencas: In this work we have synthesized and characterized sodium doped SrSiO3 electrolyte, for use in low and intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Identification of phase in-homogeneities in Na-SrSiO3 electrolytes for low temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: Great interest was placed onto this material after its first report in 2012, which was later dampened by conflicting reports about the properties of this class of materials.
Titulo: Identification of phase in-homogeneities in Na-SrSiO3 electrolytes for low temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: It is imperative to resolve this issue from the viewpoint of development of low and intermediate temperature SOFCs.
Titulo: Identification of phase in-homogeneities in Na-SrSiO3 electrolytes for low temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: Here, we report the most comprehensive data till date on the properties of this class of materials.
Titulo: Identification of phase in-homogeneities in Na-SrSiO3 electrolytes for low temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: Although it is desired to synthesize a single phase material, strong evidences presented here suggest that it is a multiphase material.
Titulo: Identification of phase in-homogeneities in Na-SrSiO3 electrolytes for low temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: The reason for obtaining a multiphase material is discussed considering the reaction thermodynamics.
Titulo: Identification of phase in-homogeneities in Na-SrSiO3 electrolytes for low temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: Additional data presented here establish that at the operating temperature (similar to 750 A degrees C) of SOFC devices, amorphous phases in the material transforms into a crystalline phase.
Titulo: Identification of phase in-homogeneities in Na-SrSiO3 electrolytes for low temperature SOFCs
